name: Mini Finger Dance
description:
Grab your friends and family: it’s time to dance!Enjoy tons of handcrafted levels and swing your way through the pulsing music beats, surrounded by a fantastic music video.
Features
Feel the rhythm in the smoothest combination of music notes and visual effects in Dance video.
Challenging: Get better every day while completing levels and challenges in the game.
Easy to Learn, Fun to Master: Everyone can understand the basic game mechanics. It's easy for anyone to pick up and play.
publishers: Shenzhen Ranger Jianghu Interactive Entertainment Co
